input_datatypes.name: mcm_controller
input_datatypes.label: Connection details for MCM API endpoint and host ICP API server

template_input_params.name: bastion_host
template_input_params.description: Bastion host for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host

template_input_params.name: bastion_port
template_input_params.description: Bastion port for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion port

template_input_params.name: bastion_user
template_input_params.description: Bastion user for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user

template_input_params.name: bastion_private_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion private key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion private key

template_input_params.name: bastion_password
template_input_params.description: Bastion user password for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user password

template_input_params.name: bastion_host_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion host public key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host key

template_input_params.name: mcm_url
template_input_params.description: URL, including port, for the MCM hub cluster
template_input_params.label: ICP URL

template_input_params.name: mcm_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Username for connecting to the MCM hub cluster
template_input_params.label: MCM Admin User Name

template_input_params.name: mcm_admin_password
template_input_params.description: Password for authenticating with the MCM hub cluster
template_input_params.label: MCM Admin User Password

template_input_params.name: cluster_name
template_input_params.description: Name of the target cluster
template_input_params.regexdesc: Name up to 253 characters long; Permitted characters include digits (0-9), lowercase letters (a-z), dash (-) and period (.)
template_input_params.label: Cluster Name

template_input_params.name: cluster_namespace
template_input_params.description: Namespace within the hub cluster into which the target cluster will be imported; Defaults to cluster name
template_input_params.regexdesc: Name up to 253 characters long; Permitted characters include digits (0-9), lowercase letters (a-z), dash (-) and period (.)
template_input_params.label: Cluster Namespace

template_input_params.name: cluster_config
template_input_params.description: Cluster config file (kubectl), Base64 encoded
template_input_params.label: Cluster config

template_input_params.name: access_key_id
template_input_params.description: Access key ID for Amazon EC2 cloud
template_input_params.label: Access Key ID

template_input_params.name: secret_access_key
template_input_params.description: Secret access key for Amazon EC2 cloud
template_input_params.label: Secret Access Key

template_input_params.name: aws_region
template_input_params.description: AWS Region Name
template_input_params.label: AWS Region Name

template_input_params.name: image_registry
template_input_params.description: URL for private docker registry from which klusterlet images will be pulled
template_input_params.label: Image Registry

template_input_params.name: image_suffix
template_input_params.description: Suffix (e.g. platform type) to be appended to image name
template_input_params.label: Image Suffix

template_input_params.name: image_version
template_input_params.description: Version (tag) of the MCM image to be pulled
template_input_params.label: Image Version

template_input_params.name: docker_user
template_input_params.description: Username for authenticating with the private docker registry
template_input_params.label: Docker User

template_input_params.name: docker_password
template_input_params.description: Password for authenticating with the private docker registry
template_input_params.label: Docker Password
